name: Illuminants (Redoak Studios, ruimartins, Diotins, Nuno Carriço, Kyx)
name_original: Illuminants (Redoak Studios, ruimartins, Diotins, Nuno Carriço, Kyx)
description:
Illuminants is a puzzle-solving game in which the player controls three characters simultaneously and has to get them to their respective portal. Those three cute little characters called Illuminants are beings made of light, which is important to know in order to solve some of levels! Put yourself to the test with all of the challenging and mind-bugging puzzles the game has to offer! 

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
    • Q/E - Rotate Camera
    • Enter - Confirm
    • Esc - Pause/Back
  • Xbox Controller
    • Arrows/Joystick - Move
    • LB/RB - Rotate Camera
    • A - Confirm
    • B - Back
    • Start - Pause
